metadata.synopsis: VB that is played when you approach the Tollhouse in SCL.Version for 2 characters.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Approach the Tollhouse in SCL with 2 characters

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Crates and caravans. The town tollhouse, surely.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Surprisingly spacious. Must have been quite active in its heyday.
